website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a desk designed for gaming, this is the best bet.
pros: Several features, including a phone charging stand, speaker stands, headphone hook, and cable management system
For gamers who need their battlestations organized, this is a great desk
Despite its small size, there is plenty of room for a dual-monitor setup
cons: Challenging assembly and could be sturdier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep all their electronics
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for each of my sons. Perfect to keep all their electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: Great quality desk
customer_reviews.text: Been using this computer desk for two years and it is still sturdy. I don't use all of the stands due to installing a dual monitor stand on it. Other than that, the quality is amazing and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Moran

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Ok waited for this to be available for a while (it's a popular desk) mine was obviously rushed through production and metal parts are warped and the "compressed board or particle" has tool mark scrapes in the wood, so even though it's got a thin cover over it the deep scratches are noticed through the cover/paint. I had to actually use additional tools to try to fix bent pieces that were so ridiculous they couldn't feasibly be properly matched to the respective positions. (Yes I followed the directions, lettering, and common sense.) Would not buying another item from this company unless I want to gamble a decent product against having to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: great for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good desk, the small metal storage "shelf" of sorts that it comes with does not hold games well. But with that being said this thing is sturdy and seems to be well made. Also the monitor stand is decent too, I have a somewhat heavy monitor and it seems to hold it fine. Obviously be careful with it because it does wobble when moved. Overall for under $100- you cant beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan spradling

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a PAIN
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 11 yr old and my18 yr old son put it together for him. Mind you my oldest rarely ever curses and I'm pretty much the momma that will clean your mouth out with soap if you do however I made an exception this one time. No clear instructions whatsoever but he was able to figure it out and his brother now has a gaming desk to use for his PlayStation and computer. It's not very sturdy but it'll do for now. Def not worth the money. I think the Walmart desk was sturdier and it was $70. Wouldn't recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PSCJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: My desk arrived right on time and it's working great. It's very sturdy and strong enough to support the weights of an original Xbox one, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, a 32" HDTV, a multitude of game cases, controllers, and two gaming headsets. I have just two issues. One is that the minor attachments like the game case holder and stuff requires a drill to install which was a bit more tedious, but understandable. Also, the table was a little smaller than I expected, but that is my fault for not really thinking about the dimensions of what I was purchasing. Overall great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Julius C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This is nice desk - bought it for my kiddo so it's fine for him. There is some movement when he is typing heavily (gaming) so I don't think i'd suggest using the upper part for an extra monitor (unless it's against a wall to prevent it from falling off). The slide out wire drawer my son took off because he kept bumping into it (makes annoying noise too when it moves), but with all that said, it's perfect for him. If you don't have a lot of things to put on your desk, you're good to go with this desk. He likes the cup holder LOL
customer_reviews.author: D3ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Desk Surface is Slippery and Gets Too Hot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to create a monitor/laptop set up for working from home. The desk is sturdy, and it fit well in my space. It was difficult to put together, and I am typically excellent at stuff like that. My legs keep bumping the pull-out drawer, which isn't very secure. My biggest complaint is the varnish. It's very slick--I had to put down some double-sided tape to keep my monitor in place. It also does not disperse heat well. My laptop fan keeping going into overdrive because it's getting so hot.
customer_reviews.author: BearWithMe

customer_reviews.title: Cup holder = ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this desk for my son who has an industrial themed room with not a lot of space left. This desk was easy to assemble. Came with some pieces that we decided to not sure at the moment. Has a cup holder off the side (which I think is so well designed) - teenagers with drinks around electronics = bad news, so the cup holder at least gets it off the desk from being knocked over. We haven’t had the desk for long for me to know about how it is going to hold up. But it feels sturdy for my 15 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Tozer

customer_reviews.title: Very unstable and junky.
customer_reviews.text: Unstable. Cheap. Junky. Made of cardboard. It's what you should expect from a piece of furniture that's only $100. I bought it because all these reviews say it's so great, one of the best desks out there, etc. No. It's IKEA quality. It won't last six months. Get a real desk.
customer_reviews.author: oconnorz

customer_reviews.title: Real Solid!
customer_reviews.text: The carbon fibre wrap looks good and has been applied really well. Solid, sturdy design on the monitor mount/platform. Very wide but a little narrower than I assumed. I also couldn't fit my laptop and keyboard on the desk at the same time[in-front of monitor] Although you could set it over to the right easy enough. I use the Razer Goliath mouse mat and there's at least 6" space on the end when it's down. The platforms for speakers and hangers for controllers are real solid too!
customer_reviews.author: hypereall

customer_reviews.title: Not for laptop users.
customer_reviews.text: I did love this desk, but I just noticed this morning after staring at it for a few minutes from my recliner that it's beginning to warp under the wait of my laptop. This is not a long term desk as I've only had it since June. I don't recommend this desk to laptop users. Solution: I'll be buying a 29 inch support leg and screwing it in the center under the top portion of the desk. Hopefully this keeps it from warping under weight of my laptop. This is an awesome desk. I like the controller holders and other features it has so I don't really want to buy a different desk.
customer_reviews.author: RadioactiveJman

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is sturdy and much shorter than it looks. It is a little complicated to put together regarding the additional top piece, but if you are not in a rush, you may be able to figure it out. My son likes it as an upgrade because he has gotten taller and outgrown the smaller one. The added pieces is also a plus, but the surge protector extra piece is a bit complicated.
customer_reviews.author: MY-VU

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk once Assembled and all pieces were there
customer_reviews.text: Help my brother get this for his gaming set up. Even though it’s his I did all of the assembling. For the most part it was pretty easy to assemble; not that many complicated pieces. All you need is a screwdriver, but a drill would be better to make the process go faster. There were a few misplaced holes, but I was able to push the screw through and put it in the right place. Instructions were clear enough, there was one confusing piece but eventually figured it out. No pieces were missing and all around it is a pretty awesome set up and desk.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I have had this thing for a while. Super useful with all the places you can put stuff, hang stuff, etc.... That said.... If you start typing on a keyboard. The monitor shakes, the metal starts clanging... I don't understand why other people are writing about this either. Like right now I am looking at my monitor. It looks like one of those Hawaiian bobble head things taxi cab drivers put up on their dash that SJWs get offended by. If this was built sturdier... It'd be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice but instructions might make u mad
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my son gaming. It is really cute and pretty sturdy the only issue is if you have a large tv maybe lesser than 32 inches it will be perfect anything bigger may require you to remove the extra pockets. The only issue I had was when adding the extra side gadgets the openings underneath was not drilled all the way thru so it was hard to nail all the way through so they are a little loose. The instructions was ok but not really good I had to try to find you tube videos to help put together
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: All the gimmicky useless attachments aside
customer_reviews.text: All the gimmicky useless attachments aside, the desk is really solid. The surface is easy to clean, the legs don't wobble, and it is currently supporting a monitor arm holding up 2 27" monitors. My only complaint is how shallow it is - sitting in my chair I feel like my monitors are right up in my face. They could've added a few extra inches to the width and it would've been fine. It's particle board with a carbon fiber (either real or fake, not sure) laminate on top of it. All the holes on the bottom are already there, no guessing or measuring is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk for gaming & school
customer_reviews.text: I got this desk for college/ gaming and it is amazing! It was very easy to put together, it took me about 45 minutes to completely set up. This desk is perfect for gaming and school. The additional things (controller stand, headset hook, cup holder) are probably the best part! They help a ton with storage. I’m very happy with this desk 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: ZippyZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Teen
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son got this for his birthday and he really likes it. He's tall and seems to have plenty of leg room. No where to put a tower, so we set it on the floor, but other than that he's happy with it. Cup holder holds cups and bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic desk for kids or gamers.
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this to replace my office desk. But it soon became my kids favorite desk to sit at. Having the monitor elevated was key for me an extra room for the laptop. I don't really use a cup holders. what I like best about it is that I can just pick it up by myself and move it anywhere I want into a room or a different room and it's ready to go. It's also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hughes

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with two dents in the top side of desk, this appeared to be a result of the Other pieces laying on the areas after packaging. Grandson said it's fine and was eager to get it Set up so he could start playing and didn't want to have to wait for another one to be delivered. It was a lot smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good desk for its target audience and price.
customer_reviews.text: Good desk with useful features. Just wish it was bigger and didn't shake so much. Had it four years now and had to remove the table top fixtures to accommodate a 40 inch 4k Samsung Smart TV which replaced an ASUS 27 inch gaming monitor. The desk drawer hinges lost a screw or two which is not an issue for me as the drawer didn't seem all that useful. Bottom line, this is good desk for gamers on a budget and can't shell hundreds of dollars for and Arozzi desk or an Ergotron Sit Stand desk.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Manohar

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: This desk will leave you with a lot to desire, the construction is of lower quality and it is not sturdy at all, the legs will make all kinds of noise any time you move. If you’re looking for a cheap desk this is not it. On the other side, if it had better leg support this would’ve made for the perfect little desk for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: good gaming desk
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy, has alot of gadgets to hook to it i didnt find too useful, but some may good price good size for smaller spaces, i stream games from it very useful
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kaid

customer_reviews.title: it's a bit pricey for a table , but it is a very good gaming table
customer_reviews.text: the gaming table itself is not metal , it is compressed wood , lukily all the holes screwed in did hold and it did not fall apart . I enjoy the rest of the table being made of metal , the cup holder is great . the cd / controller rack with hooks comes in very handy , my controllers are secure and my gaming accessories can be hooked on the back of the cd stand hat is part of the table . I lile how my speakers have separate shelves to position best sound .
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I love it. My relatives love it. I don't even use a mouse pad to use my wireless mouse on this table. Took about 2 hours to assemble it. I didn't attach all the small holders, because I have limited space in a room, but it can hold everything I need - books, magazines, CDs, laptop, cell phone, headphones, LED lamp, 4 cups, pens and notebook and even 5" wall-mountable clock. It still has a room for big monitor in the middle of the table. Some holders give a loud sound if you hit them accidently, so I would take them off or use a scotch tape to fix them in their location.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk Ever, 2+ years and counting.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for years now and it is the best desk I've had to date! Glad I got rid of my traditional office desk which were usually made from cheap material and particle board - This is made from really quality and strong material and its better than my old school Cherry wood desk because its lightweight, so I can move it around by myself to any location I want! Only wish they sold this desk in a bigger version or maybe a L shape-corner style. To make more space, I eventual took down the extra racks, so now I can put two large monitor side by side.
customer_reviews.author: N. R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sturdy desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk for a gamer or just need space for homework! It is very well built, sturdy and is contemporary. Bought it for a 15 year old boy's birthday and now his cousin says, I want that too! My husband put it together in about 30 minutes, very easy, doesn't need a lot of fancy tools. Arrived in a big box, nicely packed, heavy though, need two people to move it around in the box. I am very pleased with this purchase and will be buying at least one more!
customer_reviews.author: judbun

customer_reviews.title: Good desk, decent price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking desk, and fairly sturdy. The wiriness of it makes it look less stable than it is. The holes are not perfect, which led to some assembly annoyances. Had to go electric for a few of the screws to go in properly. This is more of a personal annoyance, but I wish there was a controller mount that was independent of that games shelf. It looks hideous when empty, but the controller mount would have been otherwise useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old son and he loves it. It's perfect for his gaming set up, however, when the package arrived the box was tore open on the side and poorly taped back together and the table was damaged. Luckily it was underneath and in a few corners so not really noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming Desk
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk. It is reasonably priced, easy to assemble and provides ample space. The height of the desk could be a few inches higher in my opinion but All of the add-ons such as the controller and game rack, headphone holder, monitor stand, etc. are optional. One thing I dislike is that the monitor stand is a little unstable and wobbles slightly if provoked. The rest of the desk, however, is very sturdy and the materials do not feel cheap. This is a great gaming desk and well worth your money. I would highly recommend this desk for any gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk for gaming or general needs.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this desk for a few months now and I love it. I have plenty of leg room and desk space to work with. It also feels pretty sturdy. I like the additional parts provided for the headset and charging station. A huge plus for the drawer that allows for easy cable management that is placed under the table on the back. Only minus I would give it is the cup holder doesn't seem to stay upright and is slanted but I'm just being picky as it still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: A lot of the add crap is useless and kinda in the way so I ...
customer_reviews.text: CONS: A lot of the add crap is useless and kinda in the way so I left most of it off. It is small, so get out your measuring tape before you buy. It's a little too expensive for the size. PROS: Very easy to put together. I like the legs. It makes a very clean design underneath, and gives you a lot of places to zip tie wires to. The small size is good if you need room. Overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Elroy

customer_reviews.title: Screws are easily stripped, and one of the screw placements was upside-down.
customer_reviews.text: I'm unable to put on one of the legs because the screw placement (the part where the screw goes in for one of the legs) was upside down, and has gotten stuck into one of the screws. Upon attempting to remove, the placement came out, and now I'm unable to place the leg on because the screw is stuck on the leg. Probably removable if I had two wrenches that I could grip it and forcefully twist it off, but I don't. If I'm ever able to actually try the desk out, maybe I'll change my review, but I'm severely disappointed in its workmanship, as I was hoping to finally have it ready before the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap screws but everything else is great.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the desk is very nice. It seems sturdy and has lots of attachments that really make organizing a lot easier. The only thing that prevented a perfect score was the screws. They were really cheap and basically made of the softest metal available. Not sure how I will ever take this apart if I ever move.. Also, the "drawer" doesn't really hold anything due to the GIANT holes in it. I mean, who designed this desk? Oh, and the cupholder snapped off due to the cheap welding.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Buyer

customer_reviews.title: You'd probably want to look for something else.
customer_reviews.text: Decent if you were a college kid, or young into gaming. Made of particle board and cheap metal. Yes price is okay as well considering the quality. Pretty difficult to put together thinking of how easy it could've been with a little better designed. Some of the bolts are impossible to reach with the screwdriver( underside baskets). Cheap metal was made for the baskets but it's kinda cool. One might say that this is flimsy. I give it a three because I feel for 115 dollars shipped it will do us justice for a year
customer_reviews.author: Tony Holt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price point. It's great being able to have a beer sitting there between all the meetings and I've found use of the shelves. Only knock would be the monitor shelf takes too much of the space and, I would assume like for myself, will mosy likely not be used. I did make it a foot shelf sitting against the legs though. Very stable desk/table.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The desk is great took about an hour to assemble it. The shipping company dinged it and chipped some finish off of it but that's ok. It holds my monitor and Xbox one 2 controllers, games and a full size mouse pad for a keyboard and mouse. Plus I have room for a tablet to watch shows on too.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great desk if you have small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small desk to use when I have to work from home and this was looks okay. Very minimal design and footprint. It arrived in a very sturdy box and the assembly instructions were very easy to read and understand. Took me about 30 min to set it up. I didn't use the speaker or headset mounts but happy I have them for future use. Overall I like the desk but it does seem to wobble a bit when I type on my laptop and I can see my monitor shake a bit. Aside from the that, this is a great desk.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Flores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a few years now, and some screws have slid loose. Otherwise, it's very sturdy, perfect for gaming. I love the charging station for controllers, my phone, etc. The controller holders and game slots are also perfect. I wish there was a way to secure the cupholder because if I walk by too close it'll flip off. I love this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Cadence

customer_reviews.title: Decent Space-Saver Budget Desk
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the textured surface of the desk at all and it damaged easily. Not the most sturdy of desks, but I used it for three years. Works well in small spaces. Not the best looking desk, but it was good for the price. I ended up removing the monitor stand and charging station.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Forest

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy, confusing to put together.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good desk. The carbon fiber looks is nice, and it's very sturdy. The directions were strange and had you working around parts to put other parts in. I ended up not even putting the media holder or headphone holder on out of frustration. Overall it's a good desk, it's just kind of frustrating to put together since the directions don't make a whole lot of sense.
customer_reviews.author: Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Some assembly required. You will need a drill! Tried with just a regular screwdriver and it took 2 hours. The pre drilled holes are nice and tight, (why I recomend a drill) its sturdy and looks cool! Only down side is it had a nasty dent in it when I opened it up. The cable organizer isn't the best but it's very helpful! I also didn't install the speaker stands... but the headphone stand and cupholder is something I can now never live without. Great table would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming desk for space
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new gaming desk! I needed a decent size cause my room its not so big. Finally I found this desk I saw how much great reviews it had. Assembly eh was little difficult. The most difficult part was trying to screw it in. Im not very good using a screw driver. It took me a while but I did it! The speaker stand I didnt bother putting it on cause I dont have any and my arm is tired from using a screw driver. Overall I love it! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Solid Desk
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son. This desk is really cool but the tv stand does not fit a 32, it fits a 24 i believe. my son has a 32 in and the feet were too wide apart to sit on the tv stand so we omitted the stand part and set the rest of the desk up. he loves it. the charging station is really cool. the basket in the back for the power supply.. the cup holder, headphones holder, game rack.. all very cool. my son loves this desk and keeping his gaming area all organized.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and missing part
customer_reviews.text: The desktop materials in the box look cheap, and when I tightened one of the legs, one screw almost penetrated to the desk surface; there is bump on the surface now. Besides the cheap material, there is a missing part as well. I have already sent an email to request for the part to be shipped to me, but this is an awkward experience because I cannot complete the assembly without the part.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Didnt knew I would like it
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new desk so i got this for my gaming setup. The top its heavy and durable. Takes time to assemble and some parts you have to do some strength to put them. When is all and done it looks great and have alot of space for gaming accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Great compact gaming desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is exactly what I was looking for. It is more spacious than my previous small desk but still small enough to fit in my tiny room. The speaker rack, controller rack, charging rack and monitor mount leave much more desk space available since all those things have a designated space now. Wide and tall enough the have ample legroom. I don't have too much weight on the desk, but I haven't had issues with wobbling. Great little desk overall.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this desk for a few months now and I can't say enough good things. I have had no issues with chipping or scratches, granted the surface is almost entirely covered by a mouse pad. It is very sturdy and was easy to assemble. The accessories weren't of much use to me as I prefer the cleaner look the desk gives without all the add-ons. Nonetheless, I would definitely purchase this desk again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: but I love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use most of the attachments, but I love this desk. It's good looking and a decent size for what I need. Installation was pretty easy. I did originally add all the attachments, but took them all off afterwards because I didn't like how much room they took up. The attachments are a little bit of a pain to install, but the table itself was easy to assemble. I ended up only putting the cup holder and the charging dock on it. Other attachments seem cool, but are un-necessary for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: So I did not need all the gadgets for it and I changed the location for the headphone and it fit PERFECTLY 41 inch space I had and it’s amazing sturdy and real damn easy to install set aside 15-30 mins for this
customer_reviews.author: A.O92

customer_reviews.title: good table overall
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this desk and began to assemble it, it got scratched at the ends of the table so make sure you don’t drag it too much when it’s on the floor when you’re putting the legs on it. Ive had this desk for 3-4ish months now and its probably the noisiest table i’ve ever had in my entire life. If you aren’t interested in that, I suggest you to NOT buy this. Other than that, it’s spacious and steady for most parts, but is a pretty big desk so if you’re looking for a desk just for your monitor then this wouldn’t be the one. It’s great! but I hate how noisy the thing is. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Ali o_o

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, but a bit of a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: It is serving extremely well for my setup, and the accessories are fantastic, but the assembly is a little obnoxious. The metal peices tend to not line up with the screw holes and need to be forced or bent to fit, and the screws that go directly into the wood instead of the metal braces don't fit. I had to drill larger holes to fit the screws securely. Then again, I'm not an expert, so maybe that was the idea. Either way, both obstacles were troublesome but not impossible. Other than that, it's sturdy, spacious, and equipped with everything I will need. Definitely recommended if you know how to adjust the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. Easy to assemble (took about half an hour by myself without using the instructions), and it's compact enough to not take up too much space. My only complaint is that some of the pieces were bent and therefore assembly took some metal bending... Also, the monitor mount is no where near tall enough relative to the desk top. My laptop is 19 inches and so it blocks my top monitor by about 2.5 inches. I currently have my monitor sitting on top of a book just so i can see the entire screen. The cup holder also kinda sucks.. i made a cardboard insert for it so my drink wouldn't wobble around/fall out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 9 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this setup for my 9 year old! Was able to put his computer, VR and PS4 in one place with plenty of space after. I’ll try to get a better photo later, we’re in the middle of moving and the PS4 had not been moved yet. We did end up moving it to the back left corner, disconnected for now.
customer_reviews.author: Holly W

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid build and a steal at this price. Feels much more sturdier than I expected from the pictures. Purchased another one for my my daughter because she loved it( and beats what she wanted before by 150 :) Positively surprised by the quality. Cons: not enough room for 2 monitors unless you don't install the stand and the controller holder and phone charging station. On the plus side it is sturdy enough to support a multiple monitor bracket on the back, and I will do that in the future.
customer_reviews.author: G. Terrero

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. The desk is very sturdy and easy to set up. Al of the screw holes were in place and where they needed to be. The instruction were an 8/10. I keep my xbox one s under the monitor stand and have room for a laptop and mouse among other things. highly recommend this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Joel j

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This desk is great, I got it since my old desk was too big for my room, and this fits the bill perfect. I have an Amazon Basics Dual-Screen arm mount attached to this desk and it holds it up just fine. I ended up throwing out most of the attachments minus the Cup Holder and Headphones Holder. If you don't want to use all the attachments it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tolzy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was fun for my boyfriend to put together (: He didn't appreciate some dents/marks that came with it but it's not too noticable... If you don't pay attention to it lol He loves the grooves on the desk and loves how spacious it is w/ a few tweaks. He really appreciates the cup holder and CD organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Zendrick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy nicely made son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this desk it is built fairly sturdy so far the cup holder has broke but everything else is holding up we added led lighting to the underparts of the desk and it looks pretty cool overall this is not super expensive and it's a good deal teens love that it has a place for all their gaming stuff
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Pre-drilled holes do not line up with pieces. Makes putting together a pain in the @$$. Bent and broke a couple pieces trying to make them fit. Need a desk asap so I can't return or I would have. Hopefully it will be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Quahadi

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Does the job while looking kinda snazzy (assuming you like the minimalist carbon fiber look). Assembly mostly easy, though some of the screws were in danger of stripping out a few times. Not something you could breakdown and assemble again. The 'drawer' is mostly useless, but the cup holder has gotten a suprising amount of use. As someone who has spilled his soda on his keyboard more than once in 20+ years of working and gaming on PC I appreciate that little touch. Overall pretty happy with it for the price and purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Stedman

customer_reviews.title: No problem to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk. Functional, and gives me a place to hang my headphones which is always a problem. Better yet, they make the assembly easy. Okay, the instructions are a bit sparse, but each part has a sticker with a letter on it, and all the hardware comes in Ziploc bags with a letter on it. It was a little tedious, but with a Phillips head screwdriver you can put it together. I am challenged with furniture assembly normally but this was easy and frustration free because the labeling was so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Grant Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice desk
customer_reviews.text: I really love this desk. It has a minimal footprint making it really good for my small room. It's tall enough I can store a container underneath it for extra storage. I really like that it's setup so the accessories are optional. It's managed to survive two cats jumping around on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rabb

customer_reviews.title: Couple setbacks other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is an amazing desk and I love it so far, the only problems I’ve come across is the slide drawer under it that gets hit easily whenever I sit down and it makes and loud freaking sound that scares me to death, the next would be the controller holder and the fact that I had no clue where to put the third screw cause there was no hole for it so I just had to guess...once I did it was very hard to screw it into the top. Other than that it’s an amazing table holds up really well and is a huge improvement from playing games with my keyboard on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and you don't have to install everything
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a 24" monitor and a 17" laptop. Honestly, I would have preferred if the monitor stand was offset a little so that it fits my laptop better. However, I am making it work with the laptop hanging or the edge a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Govind Chavan

customer_reviews.title: Gaming table rocks.
customer_reviews.text: Table is the best thing ever. Perfect for your gamer. Plenty of table room, great additions for holding drinks, game headphone, accessories! Lightweight so I as a mom can move it around. Love it. Bought 2! And the price is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming desk for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent price for what you get. No damage on arrival. Not difficult to assemble. Cup holder! Cons: Not much to complain about. I actually bought this for a brother that is a gamer. He really only had one complaint but it was nothing he thought should remove a star from the rating. In the photo, you can see there's a pedestal to place your monitor on. Unfortunately, that makes your monitor too high so he tried it but quickly removed it. It may work for some people, ultimately though I think we agreed that most people will probably prefer not using the pedestal
customer_reviews.author: Brett O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but tough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The desk came in with the surface gouged. However, the surface would otherwise look nice. The challenge was the assembly. The pre-drilled holes do not line up and are extremely difficult to hand tighten. This could be an excellent desk if the shelves were easier to assemble and able to be moved to other parts of the desk.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyFirst

customer_reviews.title: Get on sale
customer_reviews.text: I've had this desk since April now and I have to say what a great deal i got it on. I got this desk when it was $90 and it has not disappointed. This desk gives you a lot of space and has a monitor stand that helps a lot. I was skeptical that the desk board was going to break because it seems to be made of cardboard and plywood but it has proven to be sturdy and has yet to bend or break.
customer_reviews.author: Chuy sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great size, easy to assemble, great look.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this desk for my son for Christmas and all aspects of this desk are great but the top of the desk was damaged inside the packaging. We had everything almost together when we noticed the 3 dents in the right side of the desk. We decided to continue to assemble as we were 90% done. Hopefully the seller will find a way to rectify the damage without having to disassemble and return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh my! I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier!!!! I know it's a gamers Desk but it's my party and I cry if I want to! Meaning I use it as I want to.. it works very well for my needs.. I have few weeks already with it and adding some gadgets here and there (and more to come) it looks just PERFECT and works as I expected and according to my needs..
customer_reviews.author: Rava68

customer_reviews.title: Great desk at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This desk is exactly what I wanted. It was easy to put together and had a lot of nice bells and whistles. I am not a big gamer but this desk was inexpensive and fit the space I had. This isn't a big desk but it seems roomy. I am able to fit my laptop, a 24 inch monitor and a microphone with a sound resistant back on perfectly. I would like to make one note though. The desk seems to mess with the light from an optical mouse so a mouse pad... Or in my case a piece of cardboard is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jex

customer_reviews.title: it's a pretty good minimal workstation
customer_reviews.text: it's a pretty good minimal workstation, excellent for a small space where you need to make good use of the space available. I got it to use as a workstation, and I certainly would not use it as a gaming desk, at least not given the way I play games. It isn't nearly sturdy enough to withstand the kind of strain a gamer would put on it in a high-intensity game. EDIT: Knocked off another star because, for the first time in a decade, I've had to use a mousepad. The surface texture of the desk does not play nicely with a blue light mouse. Cursor jumps all over.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bopp

customer_reviews.title: Good price, seems sturdy, pre-drilled holes didn't match up with hardware holes
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to put together because a lot of the pre-drilled holes didn't match up with the hardware. I made it work though. I bought this for my 11 year old daughter. She loves it... Said it's spacious. Seems sturdy, but we've only had it for 3 days. I would have given 5 stars, but the assembly and the holes not matching up was a pain for me. I am not a very handy person though. It'd probably be easy for someone good at putting things together.
customer_reviews.author: Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk i didn't install all the parts as i don't need them at the moment fast shipping just waiting on my 27in benq zowie monitor so i can remove that old tv..only thing that i didn't like was it had bubbles you can see on the second picture but i don't really mind
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time, with all parts intact. Assembly was simple (45-minutes) due to good directions and product quality - e.g., drilled holes in the right place; good design; etc. We did not use all the attachments and were grateful for the opportunity to modify the final product.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: The instructions for this desk were fairly easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for this desk were fairly easy to understand, and the holes were all pre-drilled and easy to to drive the screws into. The desk is simple, it looks nice, and serves me well for gaming. The legs are not wobly, and it seems sturdy enough. The reason I have given it 4 stars, is because the monitor stand bounces and shakes a little bit when doing heavy typing as I am doing right now. But for gaming (World of Warcraft) the monitor does not really move while pressing hotkeys and clicking my mouse, so it is not a big deal to me if it shakes a little while typing, I use a headset mostly anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Twelker

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: My son, mostly liked this surprise desk. ended up taking monitor shelf off, he didn't like height of screen, but otherwise happy. Great if you have smaller room. Compact but yet has some storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Renee C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This desk is very sturdy. The carbon fiber texture is a nice touch. Also it comes with a lot of things to add onto the desk but I'm only using the cup holder, headphone holder, and monitor stand because with everything else I think it would be to cluttered
customer_reviews.author: adam a.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk it arrived on time however it did have a dent on the desk but to me it was no big deal. It took about 45 minutes to an hour to set up. After a few weeks of using it I decided I wanted a different look so I removed the charging station and the controller rack and added my own laptop mount and bought a monitor. This desk is the perfect size and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The table/desk is pretty solid for the price. Put it together rather quickly and noticed that there even a few spare screws just in case. It looks great and holds all sorts of stuff. Wrapped two strips of black tape around the cup holder in certain spots to stop any clanging if my son should get too boisterous and cause it to clang around. That made it just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gaming and Homework - Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son has been using this for several months now and is happy. The horizontal distance between the legs is almost 36 inches (3 feet). The drawer slides all the way out and has two slots - one that is 12 inches wide and another that is almost 3 inches wide. My son uses it for gaming and as a desk for homework. It was easy to put together (he did it by himself). Aesthetically, it looks pretty cool and he gets compliments on it when friends and family come over. He liked it so much we bought one for his cousin.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy ! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this desk for my now 9 year old. So his electronics could be organized ... I think it was worth the price. The only reason I took one star away is because when it came to adding the small shelving and holders. They are attached by self starting screws that were difficult to get to tighten down. All in all it was worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: If your on the fence about this desk don't hesitate. At this price point the desk exceeds expectation. Nothing feels cheap just minimalistic. The legs are strong and feel very solid. The holes to screw everything in are nicely thought out. I've only had it for a couple days so I can't comment of the longevity of the carbon fiber vinyl getting air bubbles. But as it sits now, it's very professional. The only thing I wish it had was a stopper of some sort for the pull out draw in the front but that's just nitpicking.
customer_reviews.author: nick p

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this desk works in my son's room. The cords are all up off the floor and there is storage for all of his gaming stuff. We were limited for space and he doesn't have speakers, so I removed the speaker stand from one side and he is using the other speaker stand to hold more xBox games.
customer_reviews.author: Sugg12002

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my son for school and gaming. Was delivered in a day and super easy to assemble as a 10 year old did it in 15 mins. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: LBell

customer_reviews.title: The desk is great and customizable
customer_reviews.text: The desk is great and customizable, the only issue I encountered is that it can be a bit wobbly, and doesn't work well for holding 2+ monitors. I expected it to be a little larger than it was, and my 2-23" monitors fit, but there was room for little else. Overall a great desk for beginning gamers or those who like the minimalist look. Absolutely loved the drink holder, but you can accidentally hit your drink on the top of the desk as it is directly under the top and not sticking out.
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh

customer_reviews.title: GET IT
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence about getting this, just get it! I opted to not put in the speaker stands and the controller/cd holder and it suites my every need. Super easy to put together, took me maybe 30 mins by myself. Looks awesome too! The pictures don't do it justice. It looks like carbon fiber!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a little dumb to building, but I was able to get this thing built and set up in a little under 20 minutes. I now have two of them side by side in my gaming room, each with dual monitor setup. The cord slots keep the cords tucked away out of sight and away from potential snagging and the cup holder is actually kinda nice. Didn't bother with the other optional rack setups but if you like it feel free to install those as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very functional for computing and gaming
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this setup. The assembly directions could be more detailed (or have better diagrams) but in the end the screws only fit certain predrilled holes so you can’t mess it up.
customer_reviews.author: Marty S

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the desk
customer_reviews.text: Very nice desk, the surface is thick and of solid construction. The desk is well made for the price but could be a bit more sturdy. I have it on a tile floor and it has a slight wobble to it but nothing that would concern me. The added cup holder is nice to have the drinks off the desk and away from the tower. I don't use the monitor mount, the CD rack or the charging station because I have two monitors and need the space. The speaker mounts are a nice addition as well. Overall for 100 bucks its a very nice desk that should suit your needs, would easily recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kp

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and EASY assembly. Took about 30 mins to assemble with a screw driver and crescent wrench. Once you get the desk assembled, everything else is optional. The cup holder hangs on any leg. The speaker holders, media holder, surge protector cage, monitor stand, and headphone hook are all options that you can add or not. The drawer is is small with a plastic insert to hold small items.The desk itself has a texture or look to it, it isn't flat black - very nice looking. I would recommend this desk as I bought and assembled 2 without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought two came early Took time putting it together but its very well labeled and pretty simple to follow be careful putting in screws they will bubble up the top of the desk if your using a drill as I did
customer_reviews.author: womansworth

customer_reviews.title: Good solid desk with lots of flexibility.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet desk. Lots of options if you need them. EASY to put together and get it working. Some of the "attachments" I didn't use because I didn't feel like messing with them. I can see this desk maybe being annoying if you put on everything. But really it didn't seem that bad. Stable desk. Holding a 27inch Mac via Monitor Arm attached to the desk. Probably pushing the desk to the limit but its working great! I like the table top style and its roomy enough with the MAC arm mounted to add in another 24 inch monitor and small laptop.
customer_reviews.author: RadoBikeNBeer

customer_reviews.title: ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: looks nice and seems sturdy. Having to drill into the desk and having screws hanging out some lost a lot of this desk's appeal. If everything on the desk assembled with a correct fit would be a much better desk. However has plenty of perk with the drink holder, charging dock area, speaker placement and headphone holder; all nice and useful additions.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits!
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. It's sleek, the installation is easy, everything has a spot where it belongs. I've had it for about a year now and still looks like new. My buddies also seem to like it a lot and always ask about it. It's designed well and sturdy enough to lean your feet up on if that's something you find yourself doing. The monitor sits up high enough so I can have my laptop open up while playing. Very happy with my purchase. 10/10 would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Estee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy desk.
customer_reviews.text: This desk is great. Everything went together well and works great. Strong, sturdy, and stylish. Only Down side is that the smaller screws ripped out of the desk for me. Although when I was moving the desk into my new house the bucket got caught on something. So that's my fault that it happened, but I'd still suggest being careful. The metal on everything besides the legs seems a little thin and fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Good smaller desk
customer_reviews.text: I found it easy to assemble and works perfect for my set up. Depending on the monitor you may need to not install the stand if the legs are too spread out on the monitor stand. Would not recommend putting a tower on it though. Plan to get a tower stand to keep my tower off the floor. Would definitely buy again and may be soon for my second set up. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just screamed practical and stylish once assembled! It looks exactly as the picture shows!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received this from UPS, I took it upstairs and immediately put it together. I had to see it what it would look like assembled, and how glorious it was to my not-too-high-standard-eyes. I loved it! It fit perfectly in my room and where I wanted to put it! It was easy, and actually fun to assemble. It only took me about an hour or so. If you're on the fence, get off and buy it! As long as you're not looking for anything fancy, and prefer practical over luxury, then this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: E. Cantu

product_meta.title: Atlantic Gaming Original Gaming Desk - 32 inch TV Stand, Charging Station, Speaker/5 Game/Controller/Headphone Storage
product_meta.description: The sleek charcoal colored carbon fiber laminated desk top has ample room for a monitor, keyboard, laptop, plus equipped cable management--and there's no need for a monitor stand because there's already one built in. The desk wouldn't be complete without the handy tablet and phone charging station. Best of all? You don't even have to be a gamer to enjoy this desk that has a place for everything. Super easy to clean and minor assembly required
feature_bullets: MADE FOR GAMERS – Atlantic’s Gaming Desk is specifically designed for all your gaming gear, so you can focus on that epic battle. Made with sleek charcoal colored carbon fiber laminated top, provides ample room for your monitor, PC, laptop, games, speakers and more and monitor shelf dimensions- length is 15.5 inch left to right ,width is 7 inch front to back, height is 6.25 inch from desktop

FEATURE RICH – this gaming computer desk includes a charging stand for your tablet or smart phone, speaker stands, game storage, under-desk basket, controller stand, built-in wire-management, rear power strip holder, cup holder and headphone/VR headset hook

MONITOR & SMART PHONE STAND – 6H x 7W x 22L inch elevated shelf supports up to 27 inch monitor, remove shelf for up to 32 inch monitor. You can also charge your smart phone or tablet and have it comfortably at hand. These features free up valuable desktop space and with its smooth, rounded contours offer a contemporary style that adds a touch of sleek sophistication to any home office, dorm room or bedroom.

GAME ROOM ORGANIZATION - whether you have a dedicated game room or a just place where you need a desk, the Gaming Desk helps you work and play. Keep all of your video game equipment in one place where it is easy to use

CUSTOMER SERVICE - our Customer Service team, based right here in the U.S.A. works hard to provide support for a wide assortment of items. For more than 30 years, California based Atlantic, Inc., receive calls with various questions about our products and we apply our best possible efforts to deliver the best possible solution for your purchase

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,046 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
